CustomField.description: Returns ACV only when BL Forecast Category is Commit. Use for summing committed pipeline in reports.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(Eudia_Tech__c, ISPICKVAL(BL_Forecast_Category__c, "Commit")), IF(ISPICKVAL(Sales_Type__c, "Renewal"), Renewal_Net_Change__c, ACV__c), 0 )
CustomField.label: Quarterly Commit
